column4: "find it of little interest;" Pycelle said. "It was a ponderous tome by Grand Maester Malleon"
"With Descriptions of Many High Lords and Noble Ladies and Their Children; by Grand Maester Malleon"
"Descriptions of Many High Lords and Noble Ladies and Their Children; by Grand Maester Malleon. Pycelle"
"Children; by Grand Maester Malleon. Pycelle had spoken truly; it made for ponderous reading. Yet Jon"
"by Grand Maester Malleon. Pycelle had spoken truly; it made for ponderous reading. Yet Jon Arryn"
"this damnable book.  A sharp rap on the door heralded Jory Cassel. Ned closed Malleon"
"this damnable book.  A sharp rap on the door heralded Jory Cassel. Ned closed Malleon"
"her fatted calves."  On the way to the door; Lord Petyr spied Grand Maester Malleon"
"her fatted calves."  On the way to the door; Lord Petyr spied Grand Maester Malleon"
"so it was. All those bastards; all with hair as black as night. Grand Maester Malleon"
"Maester Malleon recorded the last mating between stag and lion; some ninety years ago; when Tya"
"Baratheon; third son of the reigning lord. Their only issue; an unnamed boy described in Malleon"
